definition: to reduce or waive (taxes, punishment, rent, tuition etc)
to lower/to decrease/to reduce/to subtract/to diminish
to excuse sb/to exempt/to remove or dismiss from office/to avoid/to avert/to escape/to be prohibited

sentences.english: Master Demonologist (Felhunter) will now also reduce damage taken by Holy.
sentences.chinese: 恶魔学识大师现在也能减免神圣伤害。

sentences.english: A the adoption of value-added tax reform and tax relief for the company.
sentences.chinese: 通过的价值增值的公司税制改革和税收减免。

sentences.english: Gives high earners big breaks on the payroll tax.
sentences.chinese: 给予高收入者较大幅度的收入税减免。

sentences.english: The benefit can be achieved through tariff reductions and early harvest.
sentences.chinese: 这种让利，比如通过减免关税，通过早期收获实现。

sentences.english: We must use all potential means of raising resources, including debt relief.
sentences.chinese: 我们必须利用所有潜在的筹资手段，包括减免债务。

sentences.english: The entire “Korean wave” is manufactured through subsidies and tax breaks.
sentences.chinese: 整个“韩流”是建立在政府补贴和赋税减免的基础上。

sentences.english: Several-hundred activists took part, demanding an end to tax havens for the rich.
sentences.chinese: 游行得人们要求结束为富人设定的减免税政策。

sentences.english: It is possible the tax write-off alone will make homebuying right for you.
sentences.chinese: 可能税务减免是你购房时的有利因素。

sentences.english: Basic reasons for such choice are extinction of severe and chronic pains and the cost of sustaining such existences .
sentences.chinese: 此种选择之基本理由是减免痛苦及维持之负担。

sentences.english: Funding for the credits wouldcome from a new tax on employer-provided health benefits.
sentences.chinese: 减免资金将来自一个由雇主支付健康福利的新税种。

sentences.english: Certificate issuance of tax deduction or exemption proofs.
sentences.chinese: 一三关于减免税捐相关证明之核发事项。

sentences.english: An additional $5, 000 tax credit wouldbe given to low-income families.
sentences.chinese: 低收入家庭将得到额外5000美元的税收减免。

sentences.english: We should firmly implement the report system of tax deduction and exemption.
sentences.chinese: 坚决执行减免税申报制度。

sentences.english: Those trapped in sex mania will find long-awaited relief in No Stones.
sentences.chinese: 那些被困在性躁狂症会找到期待已久的减免没有乐队。

sentences.english: I will cut taxes - cut taxes - for 95% of all working families.
sentences.chinese: 我将减税，为95%的工薪家庭减免税赋。

sentences.english: Period of supervision of special goods entitled to duty exemption or reduction will be specified by the Customs General Administration.
sentences.chinese: 特定减免税进口货物的监管年限由海关总署规定。

definition: to prevent/to avoid/to excuse/to exempt/to relieve/(of a debt) to remit
to give an extra subsidy, or bonus etc/bonus/perquisite
not liable to taxation (of monastery, imperial family etc)/tax free/duty free (shop)
